forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: "Sun omits shadow" + better shadow limits

comments.text: Hi! Here's what's new in version 159.1 (you're on [version])! Thx everyone!
There's a new area "..." setting: "Sun omits shadow"! Use it if your area is e.g. a dungeon or otherwise doesn't need sun shadows, or if you want to optimize display speed...
Also, currently, the nearest placed light casts shadows... this now also works if you had multiple lights merged into one thing!
... Before, it might have cast shadows from all of them, adding lag.
could this have impacted particles? all mine seem to now be at supersayan power
completely fixed the lag in multiple areas of mine, thanks so much!
sirdesh that's interesting -- maybe we need to ensure that generally particles don't cast shadows, if that's not already this way. da, also great feedback!

thread.latestCommentText: sirdesh that's interesting -- maybe we need to ensure that generally particles don't cast shadows, if that's not already this way. da, also great feedback!
